bll_nyc_filter <- bll_nyc %>% filter(time_period == "2015"| 
                                       time_period == "2016") %>% 
  mutate(Borough = if_else(borough_id == 1, "Bronx", 
                           borough_id == 2, "Brooklyn", 
                           borough_id == 3, "Manhattan",
                           borough_id == 4, "Queens",
                           borough_id == 5, "Staten Island"))
